text: hyE#Sha san martyE#Shuq tvaM ~Myaqj~jEShvIDyaq ityA#haiqta(gm) hi yaqj~jEShvIDaqtE&paq vai dI$kShiqtAth su#ShuqpuSha# indriqyaM dEqvatA$H krAmantiq viSvE# dEqvA aqBi mAmA&va#vRutraq-nnityA#-hEndriqyENaiqvaina#M dEqvatA#BiqH saM na#yatiq yadEqtad-yajuqrna brUqyAd-yAva#ta Eqva paqSUnaqBi dIkShE#taq tAva#ntO&sya paqSava#H syUq rAsvEya#th - [  ] 31
